class.name: RegExMatch
class.brief_description: Contains the results of a regex search.
class.description: Contains the results of a regex search. [method RegEx.search] returns an instance of [code]RegExMatch[/code] if it finds the search pattern in the [source] string.

method.name: get_end
method.description: Returns the end position of the match in the [source] string. An integer can be specified for numeric groups or a string for named groups. Returns -1 if that group wasn't found or doesn't exist. Defaults to 0 (whole pattern).

method.name: get_group_count
method.description: Returns the number of numeric capturing groups.

method.name: get_names
method.description: Returns an array of names of named capturing groups.

method.name: get_start
method.description: Returns the starting position of the match in the [source] string. An integer can be specified for numeric groups or a string for named groups. Returns -1 if that group wasn't found or doesn't exist. Defaults to 0 (whole pattern).

method.name: get_string
method.description: Returns the result of the match in the [source] string. An integer can be specified for numeric groups or a string for named groups. Returns -1 if that group wasn't found or doesn't exist. Defaults to 0 (whole pattern).

method.name: get_strings
method.description: Returns an [Array] of the matches in the [source] string.

method.name: get_subject
method.description: Returns the [source] string used with the search pattern to find this matching result.
